about_the_game:
The complete digital soundtrack from the game Roomie Romance including the fully voiced jpop track as heard in the trailers.

Tracklist;
- 1. Main Theme 1
- 1b. Main Theme 2
- 2. Slow Down, Girl
- 3. Cute Girl
- 4. Relax Girl
- 5. Peaceful Meeting
- 6. On the Town
- 7. Day Trip
- 8. Shining Afternoon
- 9. Smaller Secret
- 10. Tricky Girl
- 11. Uneasy Feeling
- 12. Chasing Girls
- 13. Cascading
- 14. Sweet
- 15. Gentle Girl
- 16. Keep Me In
- 17. Curious Night
- 18. Afternoon Nap
- 19. Brighten Up
- 20. Sneaking Around
- 21. Dark Desires
- 22. Serene Beauty
- 23. Secretive
- 24. Secondary Theme
- 25. Sweet on Piano
- 26. Missed Beat
- 27. Late Night Love
- 28. Sensual Mystery
- 29. Calm Down Okay
- 30. Can I Be Your Favourite
- 31. Important Choice
- 32. She Likes to Party
- 33. Slower Fall
- 34. Finishing Up
- 35. Happy Ending Fade Out

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or better
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

name: Roomie Romance - Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 70 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 70 MB available space

short_description: The complete digital soundtrack from the game My Senpai, including the jpop theme song 'Omishiroi World'.
